item.title: Share Internet Connection Windows
item.author: dave@bennettnotes.com (Dave Bennett)
item.description: My friend and I decided to have a small LAN gaming session the other day. There was just one problem, he didn’t have a wireless adapter for his PC. Luckily, I had my Windows Surface on me and was able to share my internet through that (with the help of this USB Ethernet dongle) to my friend’s PC. To share your internet in Windows, you will need to make sure that you have a device that has an active wireless connection along with an Ethernet port.
